433 changes the rules of the game by offering you content from within the locker room. This unique angle allows us to deliver behind-the-scenes footage of the world’s biggest clubs, while bringing you closer than ever to your favorite players. Our media feature provides you with exclusive content and tells you the stories you had never heard before. In essence, we aim to provide the 433 community with the greatest moments that ‘The Beautiful Game’ has to offer, moments that before 433 had never been available to football fans.

What you can enjoy in our media section:
- Podcast
- Player documentaries
- Short film
- 433 awards
- Player takeovers
- Player interviews
- Funny clips

MATCHES
Follow your favorite club, keep track of their fixtures & results and check out the match stats that matter. Which team dominated possession? Who had the highest xG? How many of their shots hit the target? How many yellow cards did the referee dish out? It’s all in there.

Get up-to-date information such as:
- Scores
- Line up
- Game stats
- League standings
- Calendar overview
- Player stats

QUIZZES
Do you know everything there is to know about football? There’s only one way to find out. Put your football knowledge to the test with a flurry of quizzes, interactive games & brain teasers. Who knows more about football: You or your friends? Time to settle it once and for all…

NEWS
Stay on top of the news and never miss any breaking stories coming out of your favorite league or club. Keep track of your team’s transfer developments, injury updates, unmissable quotes & reactions from across the football world. 

The 433 app will provide you with fun & easy-to-read news from your favorite clubs, leagues and players. Be the first to find out about trending stories or when a transfer is nearing the ‘Here we go!’.

Backyard League, blends baseball exercises and the fun of video games into an arcade-like baseball experience in the backyard of your choice.

You need Gaming Baseball to play. Packed with sensors and long distance bluetooth. Check out backyard-league.com to get your Gaming Baseball today

Backyard League might just be the most fun way to practise and improve your fundamental fielding skills.  Improve your throwing, arms strength, ball feel, precision and consistency. Boosts your catching confidence from fast balls, various distances, ground balls and pop flys and reduces your transfer time.

UPGRADE

DO YOU WANT TO WATCH REAL MADRID TV?

Relive more than one Madrid match, and enjoy programs like "Historias con alma" or specials like "Historia que tú hiciste. La Décima".

Have you always wanted to watch the Real Madrid channel in streaming? Now you can do it and not only in Spanish. The Madrid App allows you to change the language to English and watch the match in a different way. 


 ACCESS THE REAL MADRID STORE

Another option offered by the App is to go directly to the official Real Madrid store. Are you thinking of giving a gift or getting yourself a gift? We tell you what you will find in this section:

• Games and cuddly toys for the little ones: Give a Real Madrid teddy bear, an inflatable ball or a mini table football.

From the Real Madrid App you will also be able to see all the discounts available at the official store, so take advantage and get your Madrid shirt!


BUY REAL MADRID TICKETS WITH ONE CLICK

Find out which matches are available on that date, find out the price of the Real Madrid tickets and pay directly from the App. Without having to move from your sofa!

DO YOU WANT TO GET A MADRIDISTA CARD?

It's not the first time you've heard of the " Madridista Card", but you don't know if it' s worth it. Here are some of the advantages that this card offers you:
• Discounts on tickets, store items and restaurants at the Bernabéu.
• Draws
• Official magazine
• Exclusive experiences

From the Real Madrid App you will be able to access the "Madridistas" section where you will be able to find out the price and get your card at that very moment.


GET TO KNOW THE REAL MADRID SQUADS

The Real Madrid app offers you profiles of every player, information about the matches played, points/goals scored and much more besides.
